title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: It is an almost similar incident of compulsion which is associated with Barnbougle Castle. This tower, on the shores of the Firth, or rather in the Firth, for the tide now flows round it, was the ancient seat of the Mowbrays.

title: Europe from May to December,
author: Williams, Rudolph.
snippet: Prime Minister of the Empire. We were shown the towers and those of its neighbor, Barnbougle Castle.
